code: if (FALSE) { # UPDATING global_denoms global_denoms <- get_global_denoms() usethis::use_data(global_denoms, overwrite = TRUE) write_csv(global_denoms, "inst/extdata/global_denoms.csv") }

what: Pull MPX Case and Death Data — get_mpx_cases
title: Pull MPX Case and Death Data — get_mpx_cases
text: function provides standardized interface read CDC Monkeypox line-list data local path, Sharepoint/Teams, Azure DataLake. interface liable change longer-term data storage changes.

title: Pull MPX Case and Death Data — get_mpx_cases
code: get_mpx_cases(path, connection = NULL, include_endemic = TRUE)  get_mpx_deaths(path, connection = NULL, include_endemic = TRUE)

title: Pull MPX Case and Death Data — get_mpx_cases
text: path character string path MPX data connection (optional) spoConnection AzureStor::storage_container object include_endemic (boolean, default: TRUE) data MPX endemic countries included?

title: Pull MPX Case and Death Data — get_mpx_cases
text: data frame n rows 4 variables: Country character English name administrative region date date reporting date cases integer cumulative monkeypox cases iso3code character ISO 3166-1 alpha-3 country code

title: Pull MPX Case and Death Data — get_mpx_cases
text: Note assumes path links "wide" Tabular dataset (CSV/TSV/Excel, currently) first column Country, following columns dates. pivoted internally "long", ISO code inferred Country column.

title: Pull MPX Case and Death Data — get_mpx_cases
code: if (FALSE) { # Using local path (on your PC or from shared drive) path <- "<path_to_my_dir>/mpx_data.csv"  get_mpx_cases(path)  # From Sharepoint / MS Teams (remotely) # In this case, path should be relative to the Shared Documents folder spo_path <- "<My Sharepoint Folder>/mpx_data.csv" spo_con <- spoConnection$new(  tenant = "Tennant-Id",  client_id = Sys.getenv("CLIENT-ID"),  client_secret = Sys.getenv("CLIENT-SECRET"),  teams_name = "My-Team-Name" )  get_mpx_cases(spo_path, connection = spo_con)  # From Azure Data Lake   azdl_path <- "<path_to_azdl_folder>/mpx_data.csv"   # Retrieve token using app registration  token <- AzureRMR::get_azure_token(   "https://storage.azure.com",   tenant = Sys.getenv("AZURE_TENANT_ID"),   app = Sys.getenv("AZURE_APP_ID"),   password = Sys.getenv("AZURE_APP_SECRET") )  # We use the Blob URL, but DFS should work too azdl_con <- AzureStor::storage_container("https://<my_azdl_site>.blob.core.windows.net/<my_azdl_container>/", token = token)  get_mpx_cases(azdl_path, connection = azdl_con)   }
